title: Hector Zazou discography
description:
Hector Zazou Discography
A MUSIC torrent :)
Dig the faery word of Hector Zazou
  <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hector_Zazou" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hector_Zazou</a>

Some time ago ill88eagle, my brother and me were musing about some new interesting discography to build...
My wife simply said: - Why don't you try Hector Zazou... I guess you all should like him?
- Hector who???
But eagle and my brother said: - Trust your wife.
And so we started chasing... and it was really worth the effort...
Zazou was a peculiar artist who explored the music scene in a very personal way... From his progressive "Erik Satie" beginnings with ZNR to electronic music, mixed with avantgarde and especially world music of whatever kind: african, asian until sacred celtic music.
He worked with many artists, known and unknown: Bill Laswell, Brendan Parry, David Sylvian, Harold Budd and also Bony Bikaye, Carlos NÃƒÂºÃƒÂ±ez, Sainkho Namtchylak - just to cite some of them (and I guess the last three will be unknown to many of you :) )
Surely a torrent not for MTV consumers... but my mates and me are stubborn... we believe in music... 
There are 27 album and a DVD (from Quadri + Chromies: a loopable visual installation, worth a Venice Biennal, with the artwork of Bernard Caillaud with the music tapestries of Zazou).
All the album are zipped (since the number of files was too high for TPB). The sampling rate is 320kbps when possible. Different rates are signed in the name of the albums zips. Enjoy :)
